EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2018-01-23-Field-East-RD-Sponsored-Montreal.ES-2017-12-06-Montreal-02.EMAIL
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited: Canadiens v. Avalanche
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/vip-montreal/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We are pleased to invite you to an exclusive event on January 23rd, as the Montreal Canadiens take on the Colorado Avalanche. We're expecting a fantastic evening filled with food, drinks, and of course, hockey. We hope you will accept this invitation to join us, learn more about Turbonomic, and network with your peers in the technology industry.
Montreal IT Networking Event: Hosted by Cisco & Turbonomic Montreal Canadiens vs Colorado Avalanche
Bell Centre; 1909 Avenue des Canadiens-de-Montréal Montréal, QC H4B 5G0, Canada Tuesday, January 23rd 6:30pm <[[https://turbonomic.com/vip-montreal/]]>
We hope to see you there,
- The Turbonomic Team
